original: intros. intros Hloc Hexflocx. unfold ex_filterdiff in Hexflocx. destruct Hexflocx as [lf Hlf]. unfold ex_filterdiff. exists lf. intros P HP. unfold filterdiff in Hlf. apply Hlf in HP as Hlim. apply filterdiff_ext_loc with (f:=f) (g:=g) (l:=lf) in Hloc. apply Hloc; auto. apply locally_ex_dec. intros. apply filter_imp with (P:=(fun y : U => f y = g y)). intros y' Hy'. apply Hy'. apply Hlim. apply filterlim_comp_2. apply Hlim. apply filterlim_norm_zero.
